trans-unit.source: Specifies a rotation transformation.
trans-unit.target: 指定旋轉轉換。

trans-unit.source: Rotations in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] usually consist of two arguments: a point around which to rotate an object or set of objects, and a value in degrees or radians that determines the amount of rotation.
trans-unit.target: 中的旋轉[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)]通常是由兩個引數︰ 點繞著旋轉的物件或一組物件，而在中度或弧度為單位的值，決定的旋轉角度。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)], it is necessary to specify a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> rather than a point around which to rotate.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)]，它就必須指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D>而不是周圍旋轉的點。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D>

trans-unit.source: Rotations in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] become more complicated when they are animated.
trans-unit.target: 中的旋轉[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]變得更複雜，當它們有動畫效果。

trans-unit.source: To animate a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] rotation using RotateTransform3D, you can animate the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D.Angle%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D.Axis%2A> properties of an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D>, or specify a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.QuaternionRotation3D> for the transform..
trans-unit.target: 要製作動畫[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]循環使用 RotateTransform3D，您可以動畫顯示<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D.Angle%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D.Axis%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D>，或指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.QuaternionRotation3D>的轉換..</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.QuaternionRotation3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D.Axis%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D.Angle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Axis/angle rotations in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] are specified in degrees, not radians.
trans-unit.target: 中的軸/角度旋轉[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]以度為單位，不弧度為單位指定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D"></xref> class with the specified rotation.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D"></xref>類別指定的旋轉。

trans-unit.source: Rotation3D that specifies the rotation.
trans-unit.target: Rotation3D 會指定旋轉。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D"></xref> class with the specified center and rotation.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D"></xref>類別指定的中心和輪替。

trans-unit.source: Rotation3D that specifies the rotation.
trans-unit.target: Rotation3D 會指定旋轉。

trans-unit.source: Center of the transformation's rotation.
trans-unit.target: 旋轉中心的轉換。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D"></xref> class uusing the specified rotation and center coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D"></xref>類別 uusing 指定旋轉和中心座標。

trans-unit.source: Rotation3D that specifies the rotation.
trans-unit.target: Rotation3D 會指定旋轉。

trans-unit.source: Double that specifies the X value about which to rotate.
trans-unit.target: 雙精確度浮點數指定的旋轉中心的 X 值。

trans-unit.source: Double that specifies the Y value about which to rotate.
trans-unit.target: 雙精確度浮點數指定的旋轉中心的 Y 值。

trans-unit.source: Double that specifies the Z value about which to rotate.
trans-unit.target: 雙精確度浮點數指定的旋轉中心的 Z 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the X coordinate of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> about which to rotate.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 X 座標<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref>的旋轉中心。

trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.target: 雙精確度浮點數表示的 X 座標<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref>的旋轉中心。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D.CenterX*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D.CenterX*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D.CenterX*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Y coordinate of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> about which to rotate.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 Y 座標<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref>的旋轉中心。

trans-unit.target: 表示的 Y 座標的雙精確度浮點數<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref>的旋轉中心。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D.CenterY*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D.CenterY*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Z coordinate of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> about which to rotate.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的 Z 座標<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref>的旋轉中心。

trans-unit.source: Double that represents the Z coordinate of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> about which to rotate.
trans-unit.target: 雙精確度浮點數表示的 Z 座標<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref>的旋轉中心。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D.CenterZ*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D.CenterZ*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D.CenterZ*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D"> </xref>，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D"></xref>物件，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結和動畫，但是其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rotation3D"></xref> that specifies the rotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rotation3D"></xref>指定旋轉。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Rotation3D that specifies an angle of rotation about an axis.
trans-unit.target: Rotation3D 會指定的軸旋轉的角度。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D.Rotation*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D.Rotation*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D.Rotation*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> that represents the rotation.
trans-unit.target: 擷取<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"> </xref> ，代表旋轉角度。

trans-unit.source: Matrix3D that represents the rotation.
trans-unit.target: 代表旋轉 Matrix3D。
